answers.question: What dental services are available for Ukrainian refugees in Romania?
answers.answer: Ukrainian refugees in Romania can benefit from services including consultation, treatment of simple caries, oral mucosa conditions, dental extractions, alveolar curettage, hemorrhage treatment, decapsulation, removable acrylic prosthesis, physiognomic or semi-physiognomic prosthetic elements, and devices for congenital malformations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.question: How much do these dental services cost for refugees?
answers.answer: Dental services are covered 100% for those aged 0-18 years. For people over 18, coverage varies between 60% and 100% depending on the service type. Young people aged 18-26 who are students (including high school graduates until the academic year starts, up to 3 months), apprentices, or students without work income, receive 100% coverage. People with special legal conditions also receive 100% coverage for some services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.question: What age groups are covered by this dental program?
answers.answer: The dental program covers individuals aged 0-18 years and people over 18 years. Within the over 18 age group, specific provisions for 100% coverage apply to young people aged 18-26 who meet certain student or apprentice criteria.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.question: How can refugees find participating dentists?
answers.answer: Refugees can find participating dentists by viewing a list of dentists who work with the National Insurance House. This list is linked on the page.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.question: When are these dental services available?
answers.answer: The provided information does not specify the exact times or days when these dental services are available.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.
